argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | orrvccel.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | orrvccel.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) |
| 3 |  | orrvccel.4 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_domprobsiga | |- ( P e. Prob -> dom P e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom P e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 6 |  | #P_retop | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_rrvmbfm | |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) <-> X e. ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> X e. ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-brsiga | |- BrSiga = ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( dom P MblFnM BrSiga ) = ( dom P MblFnM ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_syl6eleq | |- ( ph -> X e. ( dom P MblFnM ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 7, 12, 3 | #P_orvcval4 | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = ( `' X " { y e. U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) | y R A } ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_uniretop | |- RR = U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_rabeq | |- ( RR = U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) -> { y e. RR | y R A } = { y e. U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) | y R A } ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_ax-mp | |- { y e. RR | y R A } = { y e. U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) | y R A } |
| 17 | 16 | #P_imaeq2i | |- ( `' X " { y e. RR | y R A } ) = ( `' X " { y e. U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) | y R A } ) |
| 18 | 13, 17 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = ( `' X " { y e. RR | y R A } ) ) |
